EmailTemplate.name: IG Form Nurturing
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Independent}}, more resources about independent consulting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
Thank you for downloading content from The Independent's Guide! I hope you found it helpful.
I wanted to let you know that MBO Partners provides independent consultants like you with more valuable resources. Here are three places to get started:
- The Independent Consulting Brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>: Our monthly newsletter packed with tips, events, and relevant content tailored to independent consultants. - Independent Consulting Webinar Series <http://info.mbopartners.com/SeriesSign-up_RegistrationPage.html>: Each month, we invite guest experts to come speak on a variety of topics affecting independents. - The State of Independence <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/index.html>: Our annual research report site offers original data, infographics, interactive tools, and profiles of other independent workers.
Thank you for you interest in MBO Partners. Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. ___________________________________ Sara Conde Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6028 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
